quote: Caedite eos. Novit enim Dominus qui sunt eius. (""Kill them all. For the Lord knoweth them that are His."" Supposedly said when asked by a Crusader how to distinguish the Cathars from the Catholics.)
quote_letters: CAEDITE EOS NOVIT ENIM DOMINUS QUI SUNT EIUS KILL THEM ALL FOR THE LORD KNOWETH THEM THAT ARE HIS SUPPOSEDLY SAID WHEN ASKED BY A CRUSADER HOW TO DISTINGUISH THE CATHARS FROM THE CATHOLICS
